content: this is a great project for colourful yarn cakes as it is worked in the rounds seamlessly only shoulder straps have to be added separately **skill level ** ​advanced beginner/intermediate **gauge ** ​in pattern 15st by 9 row= 4 inches **size ** small bust size 32-34 medium bust size 36-38 large bust size 40-42 xl bust size 44-46 xxl bust size 48-50 xxxl bust size 52-54 **yarn ** 450g 500g 550g 600g 700g 750g or 1868 2077 2284 2492 2907 3115 yds wolltraum my melody 4 ply fingering weight/#2 50% cotton 50% acrylic **crochet hook ** 3 25mm/d or size to obtain gauge **you will need also ** scissors tapestry needle stitch marker **stitches used ** chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet fpdc front post double_crochet bpdc back post double_crochet **video tutorial ** https //www youtube com/watch v=arbisofjjiq
